mapper.select: SELECT J.*,R.STAR,R.R_COUNT,NVL2(W.ID,'Y','N') WASH, l.w_count FROM LECTURE J LEFT JOIN (SELECT LT_NO ,ROUND(AVG(STAR)) STAR, COUNT(*) R_COUNT FROM REVIEW WHERE RV_CODE != 'RE03' GROUP BY LT_NO) R ON J.LT_NO = R.LT_NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM WISHLIST WHERE ID = #{id}) W ON J.LT_NO = W.LT_NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT lt_no, count(lt_no) w_count from WISHLIST group by lt_no) L ON J.LT_NO = L.LT_NO WHERE J.LT_ST_CODE = 'L01' AND J.UP_CTGR = #{upCtgr} AND J.DOWN_CTGR = #{downCtgr} ORDER BY J.LT_NO
SELECT C.* , U.NAME UP_NAME FROM CTGR C JOIN CTGR U ON C.UP_CTGR = U.CTGR_ID WHERE C.UP_CTGR = #{upCtgr} ORDER BY C.CTGR_ID
SELECT C.* , U.NAME UP_NAME FROM CTGR C JOIN CTGR U ON C.UP_CTGR = U.CTGR_ID WHERE C.CTGR_ID = #{downCtgr}

WITH LECT_DETA AS( SELECT L.* ,U.name,U.cre_intro,NVL2(W.ID,'Y','N') WASH, C.w_count FROM LECTURE L JOIN USERS U ON L.CRE_ID = U.ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM WISHLIST WHERE ID = #{id}) W ON L.LT_NO = W.LT_NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT lt_no, count(lt_no) w_count from WISHLIST group by lt_no) C ON L.LT_NO = C.LT_NO WHERE L.LT_NO = #{ltNo}) SELECT L.*,NVL2(S.TLSN_NO,'Y','N') MY_SUGANG FROM LECT_DETA L LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM SUGANG WHERE ID = #{id}) S ON L.LT_NO = S.LT_NO
SELECT REVIEW.* ,CASE WRITER WHEN #{id} THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END MY_REVIEW FROM REVIEW WHERE LT_NO = #{ltNo} AND RV_CODE != 'RE03' ORDER BY RV_NO DESC
SELECT LT_QNA.* ,CASE WRITER WHEN #{id} THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END MY_QNA FROM LT_QNA WHERE LT_NO = #{ltNo} AND QNA_ST_CODE != 'Q03' ORDER BY QNA_NO DESC
